snippet: Vantiv, a payment processor, said Monday that it had reached a deal to buy Mercury Payment Systems for about $1.65 billion, adding a specialist in point-of-sale payment systems.
abstract: Vantiv, a payment processor, said Monday that it had reached a deal to buy Mercury Payment Systems for about $1.65 billion, adding a specialist in point-of-sale payment systems.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Vantiv to Buy Payment Systems Company for $1.65 Billion
